basic.name: JUU2JUIxJUFBJUU4JUJEJUI2JUU5JUEyJTk2
basic.motto: 医学·技术·管理，复合跨界

talent.name: 数据分析和挖掘
talent.tip: 熟悉统计学原理及分析方法的实现，对大数据、机器学习等数据科学应用领域有深入理解，具备丰富的全栈实践经验。

talent.name: 企业健康管理
talent.tip: 熟悉企业健康促进在学术界和产业界的实践和动向，有丰富的项目设计实施经验。

talent.name: 流行病学与统计
talent.tip: 接受完整的高等医学教育和专门的公共卫生学术训练，有宽广的人群健康视野和数据驱动的思维框架。

talent.name: 软件研发和管理
talent.tip: 持续自学编程，有实地全栈开发和项目管理经验，多次参与产品设计和技术选型。

talent.name: 产品定价设计
talent.tip: 深度参与普惠健康险等保险产品的沟通、设计、精算定价。

talent.name: 战略规划
talent.tip: 参与本地化、数字化等业务战略规划，具备从商业和市场高度评估业务和技术发展的战略思维。

skill.name: 分析建模
ul: 有大型健康数据分析项目经验。对数据治理、探索分析、建模挖掘、验证检验及结合业务 提出洞见的完整应用分析框架有深刻理解。
熟悉生物统计、机器学习的理论和应用，了解深度学习。
独立搭建过业务数据管理系统和分析工具链。
精通常用分析工具如 R, Python, SQL 等。

skill.name: 数据可视化
p: 熟悉 Grammar of Graphics，擅于结合业务用数据讲故事。
ul: 熟悉 R 体系的 ggplot2, plotly 等工具。
熟悉 Python 体系的 matplotlib, seaborn, pyecharts 等工具。
熟悉 ECharts, 封装过它的 R 语言接口包。

skill.name: 机器学习
p: 了解回归、分类、判别、聚类、SVM、随机森林、AdaBoost、Apriori、ANN 等经典机器学习原理，熟悉算法在 R 和 Python 中的具体实现和模型评估。
ul: 熟悉 R 体系的 caret, e1071 等工具。
熟悉 Python 体系的 numpy, scikit-learn 等工具。

skill.name: 深度学习
p: 了解 CNN, RNN, LSTM, 词嵌入模型等深度学习的 基础原理及其 Python 实现。
ul: 了解 Python 体系的 tensorflow, keras 等工具。

skill.name: R
p: 精通并擅长 R 的统计分析、可视化、工程开发，熟悉语言原理和生态。有完整开发 R 工具包集群，和大型统计、机器学习分析项目的丰富经验。
ul: 领导开发健康管理业务所需的 R 集群包工具链
实现基于 R 的自动分析报告引擎
实施并维护团队内部 CRAN。
公司内部 R 技术培训讲师。
开发出 recharts 等有一定社区影响力的开源包。
熟悉面对对象编程、函数式编程、高性能编程、工程开发及测试等 R 高阶技术。

skill.name: Python
p: 擅长用 Python 统计分析、可视化、机器学习、深度学习及Web编程。有完整开发 Python 工具库和小型分析项目的经验。
ul: 独立开发健康管理业务所需的文本数据结构化等 Python 工具库。
基于 Django 框架和 RESTful-API 开发健康数据后台管理系统。
熟悉 Django 、 Flask Web框架，及 pandas、 scikit-learn、 matplotlib、 tensorflow 等数据科学相关库。

skill.name: Hive
ul: 熟悉 HiveQL 的语法和 Jupyter Notebook 实现。
熟悉 Hive 表的搭建和数据的对导。

skill.name: Spark
ul: 熟悉 SparkQL、scala、pyspark 的语法和 Jupyter Notebook 实现。
了解用 SparkML 搭建机器学习模型。

skill.name: SQL
ul: 熟悉关系型数据库的表设计范式与实践。
数据库 CRUD 操作娴熟。
熟悉常用的中小型SQL数据库 (Access, SQLite, PostgreSQL, ...)。
了解最主流的noSQL数据库 (MongoDB ...) 和代表性数据科学SQL方言 (SparkQL ...)。

skill.name: 阿里云
ul: 熟悉MaxCompute的SQL语法。
熟悉MaxCompute数仓搭建和数据生产方法。
熟悉基于pyodps、pymars的模型开发。

skill.name: SAS
p: 毕业论文的主要分析工具。熟悉 Base、 Graph、 Stat、 ODS 等模块，熟悉宏。

skill.name: Excel
ul: 精通 Excel 的基本和进阶功能，善于用公式、 VBA 、条件样式等搭建敏捷的一站式业务数据解决方案。
甲流防治战中，独立完成全区疫情/接种报表报送体系搭建和运作。
公司内部 Excel 培训讲师。

skill.name: PowerBI
p: 熟练使用 Power Query 和内置控件搭建内部报表 和业务仪表盘。

skill.name: 健康促进
ul: 健康教育与健康促进专业科班出身，熟悉学科理论和研究工具。
熟悉社区及企业健康促进经典理论和最佳实践。

skill.name: 健康管理
ul: 长期深耕健康管理行业，熟悉业界动态和行业实践。
亲身参与大量企业健康管理项目的设计、实施 和评估，有丰富的实操经验。
亲身参与部门业务能力从无到有的构建，有完整的实施经验。
充分利用自身数据、医学、软件开发的 跨界能力，持续为业务赋能。

skill.name: 疾病管理
ul: 了解疾病管理的理论、方法体系和业界实践。
参与糖尿病等企业慢性病管理方案的设计。

skill.name: 公共卫生
ul: 基础医学、临床医学等医科基础知识扎实。
科班出身，流行病学、职业卫生、环境卫生、社会医学等学科基础扎实。
以“大卫生”视角思考健康议题和策略，关注支持性环境建设等宏观策略的作用。

skill.name: 流行病学
ul: 熟悉现代流行病学理论框架及研究设计。
擅长现场流行病学和职业流行病学。

skill.name: 生物统计
ul: 熟悉常用统计方法原理及其 R, Python, SAS, Stata 实现。
了解医学试验、药物临床试验设计。

skill.name: 项目管理
p: 有丰富的商务及开发项目管理经验。
ul: 熟悉经典的项目管理体系，为团队提供项目管理工具和模板。
熟悉 Project 等工具。
熟悉敏捷项目管理体系。
了解 Jira 等工具。

skill.name: 需求分析
ul: 善于提炼业务逻辑，定义产品需求。
利用各种开源工具 (Draw.io 等) 实现产品快速原型。
使用原型、文档、UML 图构建产品需求。

skill.name: 全栈开发
p: 善于在快速理解业务需求后，独立快速 搭建功能原型。
ul: 精通以 Access 为前端、SharePoint 为后端构建 CS 架构小应用。
熟悉用 Flask 或 Django 和 Vue.js 构建线上原型。

skill.name: 战略分析
ul: 善于信息检索和梳理，进行市场格局描述和分析。
了解常用的战略分析方法和工具。

skill.name: PowerPoint
ul: 善于提取关键信息并有效强化。
善于信息可视化。
善于PPT排版、配色。

job.emp: 徐汇区疾病预防控制中心

wiki.title: 关于该雇主
wiki.link: https://baike.baidu.com/item/徐汇区疾病预防控制中心

job.title: 公共卫生医师

p: 免疫规划: 规范化门诊和现场督导，数据/报表的设计与管理。
ul: 搭建区级疫情/接种报表报送体系（工具开发+人员培训），组建2人敏捷团队，及时、准确汇并、提交近千份报表和10万行个案表，有力支撑甲型流感疫苗排摸覆盖率和接种率达标。
徐汇卫生局“2009年度徐汇区计划免疫工作先进个人”称号。

p: 传染病防制: 聚集性疫情现场调查及处置，新发传染病培训和监控，传染病防控前哨单位工作督导，疫情监测报表，疫情数据挖掘分析，健康教育及随访干预等。
ul: 《徐汇区卫生报告》编委会成员，负责2010及2011两期报告中的传染病防制部分。
设计、规划辖区聚集性单位传染病暴发风险的分级识别监控和跨前布控，优化既有防控体系。
开发自动化专病月报工具，基于Stata的疾病统计地理可视化工具。

project.title: 甲型H1N1流感感染状况血清学调查
work: 国家CDC全国研究项目的区级子项目。多阶段随机抽样选取受试者，现场开展多轮问卷调查，采集、分离及转运血清标本，确保交付研究方案设定的成果。

project.title: 世博会期间传染病的公共卫生风险评估
work: 结合既往传染病疫情数据挖掘分析，利用Delphi专家咨询法开展传染病公共卫生风险评估。通过开放式和封闭式咨询，获得全面、前瞻的评估结果，为世博保障提供科学可靠的工作依据。

job.title: 项目经理/高级项目经理

p: 部门初期核心成员，较早将欧美企业健康管理服务体系引入国内，在技术/服务领域都有初创贡献。
项目实施: 创建项目管理流程。主管实施大型综合项目，交付平台产品、资讯及服务。
ul: 作为项目经理推进健康咨询系统设计开发，资讯内容按需开发及服务流程设计落地。
创建完整的项目管理流程和模板。

p: 医学赋能: 组建循证顾问委员会，负责向其他团队提供专业输出，确保健康服务和资讯循证可靠。
ul: 组织定期评审和更新产品资料、医学知识库，撰写备忘录和专业指南，为销售和运营团队赋能。
按需出具医学意见，研讨客户方案、评审外发材料，确保专业交付成果循证可靠。
各顾问分工为客户提供健康服务，如协作开发医学内容、在线健康咨询、专项健康干预等。

project.title: 某大型IT企业综合健康促进项目
work: 里程碑项目之一，为超过2.5万人提供健康筛查安排、主题健康促进服务，时效性、循证性、满意度等KPI均超过目标值。
主题健康促进：作为项目经理推进开发双语在线健康信息及交互咨询系统，主持设计服务流程并实地运营(亲身答复超过50万字)；组织医学顾问完成70余篇中英双语健康简讯；在资源和预算约束下及时高质完成项目。这也是国内较早开展的企业在线轻问诊服务实例。
健康筛查：作为项目经理全程推进竞标、实施、评估，帮助客户提高效率、降低成本。项目实施过程额外产出 (1) 改进的成本预估模型工具和 (2) 服务供应商网络拓展及评估的流程框架。与同类项目相比，该项目规模大、形式新、工期短、循证要求高，具有标杆意义。

p: 作为数据/领域专家持续助力业务发展 (6年增长10倍)。
数据分析: 负责搭建健康数据治理体系和分析实施框架，带领团队为亚太企业客户交付分析洞察和行动建议。
ul: 服务亚太80多家大中型知名企业 (包括阿里巴巴、IBM、英特尔、汇丰银行、诺华等)，广受客户赞誉。
分析客户的员工体检、健康风险评估、理赔等多源健康数据，识别风险模式和高危人群，提出循证可靠的干预建议。
带领团队按时交付详尽、多维、循证的报告产品 (文档、演示、PowerBI仪表盘等)，长期为同业模仿标杆。
介入企业健康管理项目的设计和评价，分析评估过程数据和效果指标，为项目迭代推进提供洞见。

p: 分析赋能: 作为数据/领域专家，跨国协作战略性项目，助力新兴业务扩张；跨部门提供咨询协助和技能培训。
ul: 在社保控费分析及疾病管理项目中作为数据科学和领域专家，与跨国团队合作实施方案设计、环境搭建、质量控制、挖掘分析，主持开发疾病管理软件。
为保险医疗网络部门提供分析支持，识别浪费和滥用模式，制订网络导流策略，并开发知识工具和快查地图。
利用团险理赔数据对客户健康风险画像，为医疗服务团队提供控费策略依据，设计针对性增值服务产品，维持用户粘性。
分析运营绩效数据 (满意度、参与率、应答率等)，设计服务改进策略，助力运营团队服务效能在业内领先。
担任公司培训讲师，定期为内部员工提供Excel实用技能培训。
开设R语言训练营，为骨干员工 (运营、核保、采购等) 培训进阶数据处理及分析技能。

p: 战略规划: 收集商业情报，起草规划和商业论证；推进战略项目，向中国区高层汇报进展，促进本地化、敏捷化、数字化升级。
ul: 本地化转型：与合作伙伴沟通需求，推动内部各条线设定计划、转变业务模式；推进组建健康服务卓越运营中心，促成运营部门跨职能融合和本地化转型。
数字化升级：起草商业论证，获取顶层预算支持。设计平台概念原型和业务需求路线图，推进系统架构升级，对旧平台实施移动互联化改造。
生态合作：与本地大健康服务公司深度合作，导接多样化健康服务，优化价值分工。推进尽职调查、协议谈判和对接落地。合作使业务量扩大了20%。

p: 业务治理: 创建项目管理流程，主管实施大型项目，输出和维护组织知识资产。
ul: 创建项目管理流程，开发全套文件模板，推动建成项目型团队。
主管多个大型企业健康管理项目的招投标、实施、评价全程，为部门积累组织知识资产。
搭建基于Teams+SharePoint的项目管理协作系统，维护产品/项目知识库，并通过Power Automate (Flow) RPA实现流转签报。
设计开发项目成本估算模型并工具化，大幅提高预估精度和估算效率，支撑主营业务的报价/核价流程。

p: 基础设施产品: 作为产品负责人推进IT敏捷开发；研发交付内部业务应用，克服条件限制，低成本灵活实现业务流转管理需求。
ul: 自主开发、搭建健康数据管理系统，结合R/Python脚本构建自动分析报告流程，将报告周期缩短到2天以内。
作为业务代表(PO)推动敏捷团队实施核心业务系统开发，实现约束性迭代升级，适配快速变化的业务需求。
为团队开发多个内部应用，涵盖团队出勤、客服记录、企业医务室诊疗、在线咨询答复评估、就医协助、循证审查、代报销及合规审查等业务的管理。

project.title: 某区社保数据分析及慢病专病管理
work: 人群健康科学部门战略性政府PPP项目。旨在借鉴美国的实践经验，为国内社保部门提供分析挖掘、控费及专病管理整体解决方案。
作为数据科学家，与跨国团队合作完成方案设计、环境搭建，并负责质量控制分析、探索性分析，部分挖掘分析，及报告撰写、翻译工作。作为领域专家，协助设计慢性病管理方案和部分物料筹备，并主持开发基于循证规则和DGA方法的疾病管理系统。

project.title: 健康数据管理及分析报告系统
work: 旨在解决数据分析过程中低效/脱节问题而启动的内部项目。依托自建工具链，逐步实现从数据治理、应用到展示的半自动链路，支撑大数据量、灵活复杂的分析需求。(受限于预算和技术条件，未实现全管线生产自动化。)
数据管理系统：通过自动转换SQL的规则模块，在工作台配置数值清理和标签赋值算法；基于字段映射词典和清理规则，实现外源数据半自动汇导、清洗、存储。
分析报告系统：通过RShiny或Jupyter Notebook配置常规参数，运行R/Python分析脚本，结构化输出结果。可进一步输出为Office兼容图表或PowerBI交互式仪表盘。
工具链维护：将常用整理、分析、可视化等功能梳理分解，开发出R/Python扩展库(均含多个扩展包)，部署内部CRAN，实现复用。

wiki.title: 关于该雇主
wiki.link: https://baike.baidu.com/item/太平洋医疗健康管理有限公司

p: 技术方向主管，负责保险数据创新、云分析平台技术栈管理和数据治理。为太平洋人寿多地承办的惠民保、大病医保、意外补充险等医保合作项目提供坚实的数据能力支撑，并作为领域专家介入沟通、谈判等业务过程。
产品设计与定价
ul: 为10+个惠民保项目设计产品，并基于真实医保大数据搭建定价模型。
为补充大病医疗保险等政府医保项目开发支出评价和预测模型，助力科学的费用控制。

p: 风险控制
ul: 为政府医保经办业务提供数据赋能服务，包括全面的基金支出报告、反欺诈-浪费-滥用侦测模型等。
利用真实理赔大数据，为核保部门搭建分层风险控制模型。

p: 技术管理和数据治理
ul: 设计维护数据科学开发流程和代码规范，及阿里云数据仓库的使用规范。
领导基金稽核软件和一系列云分析工具的开发，并产出专利和著作权。

wiki.title: 关于该雇主
wiki.link: https://baike.baidu.com/item/中国太平洋人寿保险股份有限公司/1340739

p: 为太平洋人寿多地承办的惠民保、大病医保、意外补充险等医保合作项目提供产品设计、定价测算支持。为部门数据能力建设提供技术支撑。

ul: 在多个定制型城市普惠商业健康险项目中，负责需求沟通、产品设计、定价测算及出具精算意见书，基于真实医保大数据搭建、迭代优化精算定价模型。
为补充大病医疗保险等政府医保项目开发支出评价和预测模型，助力科学的费用控制。
利用真实医保数据，挖掘费用模式，积累精算和定价依据，开发模型封装工具，助力新产品开发和模型交付。
推进部门作为中台实验室早鸟用户，提升数据能力建设，将工具和数据迁移到云平台。搭建堡垒机环境，建立并维护开发治理规范。
基于 Teambition 建立敏捷项目管理体系，提高部门项目管理效能。

edu.school: 复旦大学公共卫生学院

wiki.title: 关于该学校
wiki.link: https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/复旦大学公共卫生学院

lesson: 公共课程: 高等数学、大学物理、无机/有机化学、生物学导论等
医学基础: 解剖学、组织胚胎学、生物化学、细胞生物学、生理学、病理学、病理生理学、药理学等
临床基础: 内科学、外科学、妇产科学、儿科学、神经病学、精神医学、皮肤病学等
专业基础: 生物统计学、流行病学、社会医学、卫生管理学、劳动卫生学、毒理学、环境卫生学、儿少卫生学、营养学、卫生微生物学、卫生化学等

edu.school: 复旦大学公共卫生学院

wiki.title: 关于该学校
wiki.link: https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/复旦大学公共卫生学院

lesson: 课程：高级流行病学、生物统计学、SAS编程、SPSS、环境健康危害评估、行为科学与健康促进等
毕业课题：生活方式危险因素暴露与急性髓性白血病风险的流行病学关联

研究生会：
  • 为第七届上海研究生学术论坛环境卫生分论坛提供完整的宣传解决方案
  • 主编首期《医学院新生生活指南》

statement: 有10年以上卫生保健及健康保险从业经验的资深数据科学家/项目管理专家，具备丰富的跨国/跨部门协作经验。
在事业部的创建与增长过程中，跨条线(产品/系统/服务)贡献大量关键输出，对健康管理及大健康领域的行业动向、战略重点、实践细节均有深入理解。
坚持问题导向的终身主动学习，具备稀缺的“商业/医学/数据/信息技术”复合技能和扎实广博的跨领域知识，善于创新思维和技术变通克服限制，实现业务需求。
推崇数据驱动、循证务实、敏捷协作的工作理念，有良好的量化/分析能力和系统思考框架，善于识别、分析和解决具体问题，适应在快速变化的业务环境中调整优先级、协同推进。

tip.title: 关于本简历
tip.msg:
试着和页面交互（点按标签、图标、按钮，展开折叠面板，访问链接），查看更多细节。

  1. 响应式布局，自动适配不同分辨率的设备 (PC, 平板, 手机...)
  2. 封装了一个计算与呈现时差的方法
  3. 扩展整合了el-collapse和el-timeline组件
  4. 使用CDN加速，请确保能正常访问BootCDN
  5. 文内点可下载PDF版本

你还可以fork 源代码，部署一份自己的在线简历。

misc.footnote: 基于Vue.js, ElementUI, ECharts & i18n, 采用Webpack构建。

basic.name: V2FuZyUyMFlpeWluZw==
basic.motto: Versatile crossover in medicine, technology & management

talent.name: Data analytics & mining
talent.tip: Familiarity with statistics principles and implementation of analytics; deep understanding of applied data science on big data and machine leaerning; rich practical experience of full-stack analytics.

talent.name: Corporate health management
talent.tip: Familiarity with the practice and dynamics of health promotion in both academic society and industry; rich experience of program design and implementation.

talent.name: Epidemiology & statistics
talent.tip: Solid medical background with complete medical education and specific public health training; thinking from wider population health perspectives with a data-driven epidemiological framework.

talent.name: Software R&D
talent.tip: Continuous self-paced learning of programming; practical experience of full-stack development and project management; frequent participation in product design and model selection.

talent.name: Product design & pricing
talent.tip: Deep involvement in communication, design and acturial pricing of health insurance product (e.g. inclusive health insurance).

talent.name: Strategic planning
talent.tip: Participation in business strategy planning such as localization and digitalization, from which established a strategic thinking model that look into business and technology from commence and market perspectives.

skill.name: Analytics & modelling
ul: With rich experience of big health data analytic projects, I have profound understanding of a holistic analytic framework including data governance, exploratory analysis, modelling and data mining, test validation and business-useful insights.
Familiar with fundamentals and application of bio-statistics and machine learning, and know deep learning
Built a business data management system and analytic toolchain independently
Proficient at common analytic tools, such as R, Python, SQL, etc.

skill.name: Data visualization
p: Familiar with Grammar of Graphics, I am good at story-telling with data.
ul: Familiar with ggplot2, plotly etc. in R ecosystem.
Familiar with matplotlib, seaborn, pyecharts etc. in Python ecosystem.
Familiar with ECharts, and composed a wrapper package of R interface for it.

skill.name: Machine learning
p: Understand principles of classic machine learning algorithms, such as regression, classification, discrimination, clustering, SVM, random forest, AdaBoost, Apriori, ANN, etc. Famliar with algorithm implementation in R and Python.
ul: Familiar with caret, e1071, etc. in R.
Familiar with numpy, scikit-learn, etc. in Python.

skill.name: Deep learning
p: Understand principle fundamentals implementation in Python of common deep learning algorithms, such as CNN, RNN, LSTM, work embeddings, etc.
ul: Understand tensorflow, keras, etc. in Python.

skill.name: R
p: Proficient at statistic analysis, data visualization and development engineering using R. Familiar with fundamentals and ecosystem of R, with rich experience of complete development of R package clusters, big statistic and machine learning projects.
ul: Lead the development of R package clusters toolchain required by health management business.
Implmented automated analytic reporting engine with R.
Implemented and maintained internal CRAN.
Internal R technology trainer.
Developed open source packages such as recharts with community impacts
Familiar with advanced R skills such as object-oriented programming, functional programming, high-performance programming, development engineering and testing, etc.

skill.name: Python
p: Proficient at statistic analysis, data visualization, machine learning, deep learning and web programming using Python, with experience of complete development of Python libraries and small analytic projects.
ul: Independently developed Python libraries required by health management business, such as text data structurization.
Developed health data backend management system on top of Django framework and RESTful-API.
Familiar with Django and Flask Web frameworks and data science related libraries such as pandas, scikit-learn, matplotlib, tensorflow.

skill.name: Hive
ul: Familiar with HiveQL and implementation in Jupyter Notebook.
Familiar with Hive table operation and import/export interaction with other DBS.

skill.name: Spark
ul: Familiar with SparkQL, scala, pyspark and the implementation in Jupyter Notebook.
Know how to build machine learning models with SparkML.

skill.name: SQL
ul: Familiar with paradigm and practice of table design in RDBMS.
Familiar with CRUD operations in RDBMS.
Familiar with medium-and-small RDBMS such as Access, SQLite, PostgreSQL, etc.
Know mainstream NoSQL databases such as MongoDB and typical data science SQL dialects such as SparkQL.

skill.name: AliCloud
skill.p: Familiar with MaxCompute platform and components such as DataStudio, DataHub.
ul: Familiar with MaxCompute SQL syntax.
Familiar with warehouse build-up and data production on MaxCompute.
Familiar with model development with pyodps and pymars.

skill.name: SAS
p: Analytic tool for graduate thesis. Familiar with modules of Base, Graph, Stat, ODS etc.; good at macros.

skill.name: Excel
ul: Proficient at basic and advanced functionalities of Excel. Good at building one-stop agile business data solution based on formula, VBA, conditional formatting, etc.
During the battle against Flu A, built the holistic district level report delivery system for epidemic / vaccination on my own.
Internal Excel trainer.

skill.name: PowerBI
p: Familiar with building dynamic reports and business dashboards using Power Query and built-in widgets.

skill.name: Health promotion
ul: Professionally trained in health education and health promotion, hence familiar with the theories and research tools.
Familiar with classic theories and best practices of community and enterprise health promotion.

skill.name: Health management
ul: Long service in health management, hence familiar with dynamics and practices in the industry.
Involved in design, implementation and evaluation of numerous corporate health management projects; rich in practical experience.
Complete implementation experience of building business capabilities of health services from scratch.
Empower the business with cross-border knowledge in data analytics, medicine and software development.

skill.name: Disease management
ul: Understand theory, methodology and industrial practice of disease management.
Involved in design of corporate chronic disease management plan such as diabetes.

skill.name: Public health
ul: Solid knowledge on medical fundamentals: Basic Medicine, Clinical Medicine.
Professionally trained in epidemiology, occupational health, environmental health and social medicine.
Good at thinking health topics and strategies from 'holistic health' perspective, and focus on macro health strategies with supportive environment etc.

skill.name: Epidemiology
ul: Familiar with theory framework and study design of modern epidemiology.
Good at field epidemiology and occupational epidemiology.

skill.name: Bio-statistics
ul: Familiar with principles and implementation of classic statistics using R, Python, SAS, Stata.
Understand design of medical experiment and clinical trial.

skill.name: Project management
p: Rich experience of business and development project management.
ul: Familiar with classic project management knowledge system; provided management tools and templates for the team.
Familiar with tools such as Project.
Familiar with agile project management knowledge system.
Familiar with tools such as Jira.

skill.name: Requirement analysis
ul: Good at distilling business logic and defining product requirements.
Good at rapidly implementing product prototypes using various open source tools (Draw.io etc.).
Build product requirements using prototypes, documentation and UML graphs.

skill.name: Full-stack
p: Good at building functionality prototypes independently once business requirements are identified quickly.
ul: Proficient at building C/S small applications with Access as frontend, SharePoint as backend.
Familiar with building online prototypes using Flask, Django and Vue.js.

skill.name: Strategy
ul: Good at information searching and organization to describe and analyze the market.
Understand common tools for strategic analysis.

skill.name: PowerPoint
ul: Good at distilling and highlighting key information.
Good at information visualization.
Good at layout and palette design of PPT.

p: Certification of project management skill and knowledge system held by Project Management Institute. The verification is based on PMBOK 9. This system also includes PfMP, PgMP, CAPM etc.

Technology stack: R (tidyverse, ggplot2, caret, knitr) and git.

Technology stack: Tableau

p: Certified Scrum product owner verified by Scrum Alliance. This certification system also includes Certified Scrum Developer, Certified Scrum Master, Advanced Certified Scrum Product Owner and Advanced Certified Scrum Master.

cert.name: Web Programming with Python and JavaScript

Technology stack: Python (Flask, Django), git, HTML / Bootstrap, CSS / Sass, JavaScript.

wiki.title: About this employer
wiki.link: https://baike.baidu.com/item/徐汇区疾病预防控制中心

p: Planned immunization: monitoring standardized immunization clinics and enhanced immunization, design and management of data reports, etc.
ul: Support the team to reach targeted immunization coverage by (1) epidemic / immunization reporting & delivery system build-up (toolset development and staff training) and, (2) Merging and transmission of up to 1,000 reports and 100 thousand records timely and flawlessly, given only an agile team of two.
2009 Outstanding Award in Planned Immunization of Xuhui District.

p: Infectious disease control: field investigation and handling of outbreak, training and monitoring of emerging contagious diseases, prevention guidance in susceptible institutions, epidemic surveillance reporting, epidemic analytics and mining, health education / intervention, etc.
ul: Editorial board member of Xuhui Health Report 2010 and 2011 on infectious diseases.
Optimization of the existing system by mapping the stratified identification and step-forward control of infectious disease outbreak risks within the district.
Development of automated monthly reporting tool of specific diseases, and disease statistics & geographic visualization tool based on Stata.

project.title: Serological investigation on epidemic of Influenza A H1N1
work: A district-level sub-project of China CDC's nationwide initiative, which comprised of multiple rounds of investigation using questionnaires, and collection + transportation of serum samples on objects recruited by multi-stage random sampling. As the project manager, work with team to deliver expected outcomes.

project.title: Risk assessment of infectious diseases during 2010 Expo
work: Public health risk assessment using Delphi method combining with previous epidemic data of infectious diseases. Comprehensive and instructive insights were drawn after a closed and an open consultation, which provided scientific, reliable evidences to support Expo.

job.title: Project Manager / Sr Project Management Manager

p: Contribute to the business unit, the forthgoer that introduced western enterprise health management service system to China, from technology and service perspectives as a start-up core member.
Project implementation: create project management process. Lead the implementation of comprehensive projects to deliver products of platform, info and services.
ul: Service 80+ prestigious Asia-pacific enterprises (Alibaba, IBM, Intel, HSBC, Novartis, etc) with wide acclaim.
Design and push R&D of the health advisory platform, and the R&D and delivery of health info and services.
Create complete project management process and templates as the org assets.

p: Medical empowerment: build up Evidence-based Medicine Consultation Board to provide professional output for other teams and guarantee the professional services and contents are evidence-based and reliable.
ul: Organize regular review meetings to update product documentation and medical knowledge base, write memorandum and guidelines to empower sales, account and operations team.
Provide on-demand medical comments, review customer protocols and external contents to ensure the deliverables are evidence-based and reliable.
All consultants are responsible to provide health services for customers, e.g., medical content development, online health advisory service, specific health intervention, etc.

project.title: A comprehensive corporate health promotion program
work: One of the milestone projects, which provided health screening arrangement and thematic health promotion activities for 25 thousand employees. The KPIs of timeliness, evidence-based index and satisfaction are all above the target.

Thematic health promotion: work as project manager pushing forward R&D of bilingual online health information and interactive advisory system, lead designing service workflow and real-world operations (replied over 500 thousand characters). Dispatch medical consultants to finish 70+ bilingual health articles and newsletters. The project, completed timely with high quality given resource and budget restraints, is a successful early instance of corporate light web-based health consultation services implemented in China.

Health screening: work as project manager pushing through the entire lifecycle on bidding, implementation and evaluation, to help the client save cost and increase efficiency. The implementation also yielded (1) an improved cost estimation model which helped the team price more accurately and won the bid, and (2) process framework to develop and evaluate service provider network which later served as the standard practice. Compared to peers, this project has special benchmarking value for it is big in scale, innovative in design, short in time and  high in evidence-based requirements.

p: Continuously empower the business expansion (10 times increase in 6 years) as a data / domain expert.
Data analytics: responsible for building health data governance system and analytic implementation framework, lead the team to deliver insights and action recommendations for Asia-pacific clients.
ul: Service 80+ prestigious Asia-pacific enterprises (Alibaba, IBM, Intel, HSBC, Novartis, etc) with wide acclaim.

Analyze various client data of health check-up, health assessment and medical claims, etc. to diagnose corporate health risks and at-risk population, and make evidence-based and actionable intervention recommendations.

Lead the team to timely deliver detailed, multi-dimensional, evidence-based health analytic reporting products (in form of documents, presentations, PowerBI dashboards, etc.) which have long been the industry benchmark for peers.
Intervene into design and evaluation of corporate health management programs, analyze and evaluate the process data and effect indicators to find insights for iterative improvements.

p: Analytic empowerment: support business expansion by transnational cooperation on strategic projects as data/domain export; cross-border analytic consultation and skill training.
ul: Work as data science / domain expert in the social security cost containment and disease management project, cooperate with transnational team to implement scheme design, environment build-up, quality control and analytic mining, lead the development of disease management software.
Analytic consultation for insurance network team to identify the abuse/waste pattern, develop network steerage strategies and toolset (knowledge tool and quick map).
Customer health risk portrait with medical claims data to find evidence for cost containment strategies, and design value-added services to maintain customer stickiness.

Analyze operational performance data (satisfaction, engagement, response, etc.) to dig into service defects and develop improvement strategies, to empower the operations team with higher service efficacy
Deliver Excel skills training as internal trainer.
Open an R Boot Camp for core team members (operations, underwriting, procurement, etc.) to teach advanced data wrangling and analysis skills .

p: Business strategies: strategy plans and business cases; push forward strategic projects, report to executives to render transformation of localization, agility and digitalization.
ul: Localization: collect requirements with partners, push internal streamlines to set plans for business model transformation; work on build up of healthcare service CoE to render synergy of cross-border operation departments and localization.

Digitalization: draft business case to get budget from global management. Design prototype of the platform and business requirement roadmap, push forward the architecture upgrade of the system to adapt to the mobile internet era.

Cooperative ecosystem: deep cooperation with local health service companies to plug in diverse healthcare services to optimize division of value chain. Push due diligence review, negotiation on agreement and practice implementation. The cooperation helped increase business volume by 20%.

p: Business governance: create project management workflow, lead implementation of big projects, output and maintain organizational knowledge assets.
ul: Develop project management workflow and documentation templates to render the team project-driven.
Lead multiple big projects and work on full cycle of bidding, implementation and evaluation, to accumulate knowledge assets for the team.
Build up project management cooperation system on top of Teams+SharePoint, maintain product/project knowledge base, and implement task/approval management by Power Automate (Flow) RPA.
R&D of project cost model and tool that increase the accuracy and efficiency of cost estimation, to support the pricing and underwriting process of the main business.

p: Infrastructure product: push agile IT R&D as business product owner, self-paced R&D of internal applications to meet business workflow requirements flexibly at low cost, given architecture restraints.
ul: Self-paced R&D of health data management system, reporting automation build up with R/Python scripts which shortens the reporting turn-around time to 2 days.
Push agile IT R&D of the core business system as business product owner, to achieve iterative upgrading to adapt to fast changing business requirements given numerous restraints.

Build and deploy numerous internal applications for the team: management of attendance, customer service records, corporate clinic operations, review of online health advisory, medical triage assistance, evidence-based review, pay and claim, due diligence review, etc.

project.title: Social security data analytics and chronic disease management in District X
work: A strategic government PPP project of Population Health Science. It aims to propose holistic solution of data mining, cost containment and disease management for domestic social security department refering to the practice in the US.

Work as data scientist with transnational team on protocol design and environment build up, and take charge in quality control analysis, exploratory analysis and part of the mining analytics, as well as drafting and translation. Work as domain expert to facilitate designing disease management plans and logistics preparation, and lead the R&D of disease management software based on evidence-based medicine and DGA methodology.

project.title: Health data management and analytic reporting system
work: An internal innovative project aiming to resolve the inefficiency and dislocation in data analysis. With self-made toolchains, the team gradually implemented a semi-automated process covering data governance, application and presentation, which supports big data volume and flexible analytic requirements. (Restricted by budgets and technical conditions, we did not implement fully automated production pipelines.)

Data management system: the core rule module automatically converts SQL commands to facilitate configuration of data clean and label computation via GUI. The data clean rules based on field-mapping dictionaries facilitate semi-automated merging, cleaning and storage of external data sets.

Analytic reporting system: parameter configuration via RShiny or Jupyter Notebook to run R / Python scripts. The structured output can be further processed to yield MS-Offce-compatible charts or PowerBI interactive dashboards.

Toolchain maintenance: commonly used data wrangling, analysis and visualization functionalities were refactored into R / Python libraries (with multiple packages), and an internal CRAN was built up for reuse.

p: Responsible for insur-data innovation, cloud-based analytic technology management and data governance, with strong support to various PPP projects on social medical insurance as subject matter expert.
Product design and pricing
ul: Design benefit plans and build pricing models based on healthcare big data for 10+ customized city-wide inclusive medical insurance (a.k.a. Hui Min Bao) projects.
Develop cost evaluation and forecast models for various PPP projects (e.g. supplementary casualty insurance).

p: Risk control
ul: Empower risk control activities of medical insurance by applying fund analytic reporting, fraud-waste-abuse detection models, etc.
Build risk control models for underwriting and operations based on real-world claims data.

p: Technology management and data governance
ul: Design and maintain guidelines for data science development and cloud data warehouse.
Lead R&D of FWA detection software, cloud-based analytic tool sets and generate patents and other intellectual properties.

wiki.link: https://baike.baidu.com/item/中国太平洋人寿保险股份有限公司/1340739

p: Responsible for product design and pricing for various social insurance PPP projects all around the country. Support the data capability construction from the technology perspective.

ul: Communicate on requirements, deign the price the product, draft actuarial reports in various customized city-wide inclusive medical insurance projects. Build and optimize the actuarial pricing model based on real-world social medical insurance data.
Develop cost evaluation and forecast models for various PPP projects (e.g. supplementary casualty insurance).

Utilize the real-world social medical insurance data to identify cost patterns, generate actuarial pricing knowledge and develop wrapping tools for pricing models, to empower development and delivery of new products.

As early-bird user of the data middle-platform lab, push forward the data capability construction of the department. Migrate data and tools to the cloud platform, establish the fortress machine environment, and create the guide for data dev and governance.
Accelerate the department’s project management capability by building agile PM system on top of Teambition.

edu.school: Fudan University School of Public Health

wiki.title: About this school
wiki.link: https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/复旦大学公共卫生学院

lesson: Public courses: mathematics, physics, organic chemistry, introduction of biology, etc.
Medical fundamentals: anatomy, biochemistry, histology, cell biology, pathology, physiology and pharmacology etc.
Clinical fundamentals: internal medicine, surgery, gynecology, pediatrics, neurology, psychiatry and dermatology, etc.

Specialty fundamentals: bio-statistics, epidemiology, social medicine, public health administration, occupational health, toxicology, environmental health, nutrition, microbiology, sanitary chemistry, etc.)

edu.school: Fudan University School of Public Health

wiki.title: About this school
wiki.link: https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/复旦大学公共卫生学院

lesson: Courses: senior epidemiology, bio-statistics, SAS programming, SPSS, assessment of environmental health hazards, behavioral science and health promotion, etc.
Study for graduation: Lifestyle exposure and risk of acute myeloid leukemia (AML)

Postgraduates' union:
  • Packed promotion solutions provider for The 7th Shanghai Postgraduates Academic Forum on Environmental Health Risks
  • Chief editor of 1st Edition of A Guide for Freshmen in Medical Campus

statement: Senior data scientist / project management professional working 10+ years in healthcare and health insurance industry with rich experience of transnational / cross-functional cooperation.

Cross-border key contribution on product, system & service to the business unit throughout its creation and continuous growth; profound understanding on industry dynamics, strategic focus and implementation details in health management and the big health industry.

Stick to life-long problem-oriented active learning; volatile skills in 'business / medicine / data / IT tech' and solid transdisciplinary knowledge that is scarce; good at meeting business requirements by overcoming restraints with innovative technical turnarounds.

Advocate a data-driven, evidence-and-fact-based, agile and cooperative work philosophy; good numeracy & analytic skills and systematic thinking framework; good at identifying, analysing and solving problems; adapt to a fast changing work environment that requires flexible re-prioritization and cooperative push-forward.

tip.title: About this CV
tip.msg:
Feel free to interact with the page (tap the tags, icons and buttons, unfold the collapse panels, visit the links, etc.) for more details.

  1. It's responsive to various equipments (PC, tablet, mobile phone, ...) with different resolution
  2. A method to calculate and present time difference has been wrapped
  3. Functionalities of el-collapse and el-timeline components have been extended and integrated
  4. CDN has been applied to boost the web performance, please make sure BootCDN is accessible
  5. You can download the PDF version at

You can also fork the source code to deploy your own online resume.

misc.footnote: Powered by Vue.js, ElementUI, ECharts & i18n, built with Webpack.
